attributes.action: Raise the entry to clubs and sale of alchohol to 21, but reduce the drinking age to 16 within pubs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Problems with underage drinkers comes from the fact that they are unable to go anywhere sociable. We put strain on them in school to be more adult yet refrain them from going into a socialble environment like teenagers would have done a few decades ago. Offlicences often have 18 year olds buy for minors and clubs are often a bad environment for less mature adults.
